attributes.action: To ensue that motorists are refunded without penalty wrongly paid congestion charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The mayor of London once again is making the rules suit himself and no one else I paid a congestion charge for a wrong vehicle only to be told that I would need to fill out a refund form at the cost of £10 admin charge which means that it will cost me £12.00 to get my money back 

Times are hard out here I am self employed and really struggling to make ends meet every penny counts the government are destroying my transport business and red Ken is costing me money to and the best is no one cares 

So where is my government when I need them against this ill moral and unjust charge
